about_the_game:
Welcome to the Wallmapu Tournament: Fury of Weichafes where you can choose between 8 historical characters to fight each other and become the only winner of the competition.

You will visit different historical places in Chile such as Wallmapu (Araucanía forest), Rapa Nui, Cueva del Milodon and the pampas of Tierra del Fuego, the Atacama desert, Friendship Island, City of the Caesars and the caves of the Island of Chiloe.

A game based on the history of Chile
Enjoy the different environments of Chilean history and mythology while you fight alongside the characters of the Guardians of the South, thanks to the characters from the Chilean comic created by Guido 'Kid' Salinas and Sebastian Castro, who will face historical and mythological characters from the Mapuverse like Don Pedro de Valdivia, Ines de Suarez, a Mapuche Warlock and the fearsome Trauco.

Dynamic visual style based on the original comic
The characters are developed in great detail along with environments that you will recognize for their unique elements, combining fantasy with local elements that you will easily identify. The aesthetics of the characters is based on the definition of the Guardians of the South comic but with a modern design and agile animations that will not allow you to let go of control to advance in your fight.

Watch out for future character updates
We will be constantly updating the game to include new locations and characters, in order to make the tournament more interesting and competitive.

Characters with behavior based on A.I.
Each character is unique, in terms of their personality, aggressiveness and attack techniques, their behavior is based on their own Artificial Intelligence engine that will learn from their opponent's movements to anticipate defenses and test new attack mechanisms. You will have to learn to vary your strategy in each case!

Game mode
Enjoy the game in three different modes, only against the machine, where you must fight against each character individually to become the winner of the Wallmapu Tournament or enjoy with your friends in two modes; 2 players face to face (they can use a controller compatible with XBox or keyboard) or two players online.

Game control
Control of your character has been simplified so that you can move freely in the fighting space of the stage and you have four action buttons: Jump, Defense, Main Strike and Secondary Strike. This does not mean that there are no hit combinations that you can discover as you play.

There are two combinations available with your computer's keyboard, to remind you of fighting games years ago when there were no such massive game controllers:

left stick:
- ADWS: Allows you to move the character to the Left, Right, Up and Down.
- FGHT: Each key corresponds to the Defense, Main Strike, Secondary Strike and Jump button, respectively.

Right Controller:
- Keyboard arrows: Allows you to move the character in any direction on the fighting area.
- IOP9: Each key corresponds to the Defense, Main Strike, Secondary Strike and Jump button, respectively.

Control command:
- Main lever (Left): You can move the character in any direction on the fighting area
- Y Button: Jump
- X Button: Defense
- A Button: Main Strike
- B Button: Secondary Strike

Become the winner of the Wallmapu Tournament: Fury of Weichafes
